abilities.name: Air Form.
abilities.description: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if air could pass through that space.

abilities.name: Empowered Attacks.
abilities.description: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Yan-C-Bin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: gust of wind, invisibility, lightning bolt
* 2/day each: chain lightning, cloudkill, haste

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: Yan-C-Bin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
